name: Self-Tagging Bot
desc: Fun-loving bot that tags itself in pictures and encourages you to do the same!

name: Colorer
desc: Looks at pictures; tries to see where color boundaries are, then takes a shot at filling those boundaries in its own way.

name: Dem Bones
desc: A bot that tries to assemble skeletons at random

name: Land of Contrasts
desc: It makes those maps that tell you how each state in     the country feels about some topic. It may or may not skip the surveying part.

name: Hills
desc: It makes hills; sometimes a lot of them, sometimes a few of them. In different colors.

name: Autocomplete Jokes
desc: It knows how knock knock jokes go, but when it comes to filling them in, it needs help. So, it sees what Google's autocomplete suggests.

name: Fucking Shakespeare
desc: What if Shakespeare said "fuck" a lot?

name: GODTRIBUTES
desc: A bot that posts tributes to befitting each god! My most popular bot.

name: The Most Successful Bot I've Met
desc: A bot powered by ConceptNet and Wordnik telling you all about the most successful people it's met, so that you, too, can be successful, which is all we all want to be.
